strapiJob.title: Journeyman Plumber
strapiJob.description:
We are now hiring for licensed Plumbers to join our team!  Earn top compensation with additional incentive pay!  

Work on the team of a highly-reputable, established yet innovative and growing company delivering superior services to our large and diverse residential customer base

  • Utilize and enhance your skill set – diagnose, troubleshoot, present options, provide new installations and repair services for existing residential housing
  • Be the face of best-in-class service to our customers – maintain the highest levels of self-presentation, courtesy and respect while providing insightful information and workable choices
  • Work with accomplished coworkers and management - learn from the very best as you further your own personal and Company-aligned goals – Journeyman License required

Career-Building Opportunity

While a successful candidate must demonstrate core Plumbing Installation and Service competencies, we are adapters of advantageous technology solutions and our staff has the opportunity of working with and learning valuable, state-of-the-art service-industry functions

  • On-going, periodic product, specific issue, and cutting-edge technologies training 
  • One-on-one feedback; weekly informative/interactive meetings
  • Acquire the ability to navigate the ins and outs of various text, pic, phone enhancement and mobile software/platforms using efficient, state-of-the-art service-industry functions 

Awesome Work Environment

We are serious about maintaining our team-oriented culture centered on our Customers, our Employees, and the Company in that order - while having a lot of fun doing it

  • Enjoy the camaraderie of sharp and dedicated team players in a fast-paced environment
  • Rely on unmatched back-end support set-up to assist your day-to-day success in impressing our customers:
  • New vehicles and vans pre-stocked for a “rolling-warehouse” ▪ Mobile devices with access to detailed customer dispatch, historical info, pics, notes, etc. ▪ Reachable office staff ▪ Orders and scheduling handled for you ▪ Opportunity for advancement with growing department ▪

We hope to welcome You aboard. Paschal will provide you with a full job description upon acceptance for an interview.

Apply at: GoPaschal.com
